title: Environmental justice advocates say Trump's orders ignore reality
shortDescription: Presidents Clinton, Biden issued orders aiming to correct environmental injustice. On Monday, President Trump issued orders revoking those efforts.

title: Trump talks vision, takes shots at foes in 1st interview: 5 takeaways
shortDescription: In a sit-down interview with Fox News, President Trump remained focused on past grievances as much as new goals for his returning administration.

title: Trump picks agent who shielded him from gunfire to lead Secret Service
shortDescription: President Trump picked Sean Curran, one of the agents who shielded him during the Butler, Pa., assassination attempt, to lead the Secret Service.

title: Police officers condemn Trump's January 6 pardons
shortDescription: Lawmakers and police officers criticized Donald Trump's decision to pardon January 6 defendants.

title: Trump pardons D.C. police officers convicted of murder, obstruction
shortDescription: President Donald Trump pardoned two Washington, D.C. police officers Wednesday who were convicted in the death of motorbike rider Karon Hylton-Brown.

title: Congress passes Laken Riley Act targeting immigrants accused of crimes
shortDescription: The bill would require law enforcement to detain immigrants without legal status arrested for crimes including larceny and shoplifting.

title: President Trump's first trip set for North Carolina, California
shortDescription: President Donald Trump will visit storm-ravaged North Carolina on Friday in his first trip outside Washington since the start of his second term.

title: Trump's halt on refugees hits flight arrivals this week
shortDescription: The surprise halt of travel this week scuttled the hopes of last-minute arrivals as Donald Trump's refugee shutdown took hold early.

title: Read what Joe Biden wrote in letter to Donald Trump
shortDescription: Joe Biden told Donald Trump "may God bless you and guide you" in a letter he left in the Resolute Desk of the White House before his exit.

title: Trump threatens tariffs on Russia if Putin won't stop Ukraine war
shortDescription: In a post to Truth Social, President Trump threatened to hit Russia with tariffs if Vladimir Putin refuses to make a deal on the Ukraine war.

title: Who's the 'Camp Auschwitz' Jan. 6 rioter that Trump pardoned?
shortDescription: Photos of the bearded Robert Keith Packer wearing a hoodie with the Nazi SS skull and Auschwitz 'Work Brings Freedom' slogan went viral after Jan. 6

title: Donald Trump brings his personal touch back to Oval Office
shortDescription: From Diet Coke buttons to portraits of Andrew Jackson, here's a look inside Donald Trump's Oval Office decor.

title: Congressional leaders react to Jan. 6 pardons
shortDescription: House Republicans and Democrats react to President Donald Trump's Jan. 6 pardons.

title: This former president got love from Donald Trump at his inauguration. Here's why.
shortDescription: A previous president from Ohio could play a big role in shaping President Donald Trump's policies.

title: Trump calls for end to DEI programs
shortDescription: President Donald Trump is calling for an end to federal diversity, equity and inclusion, or DEI, programs.

title: What type of pen does Trump use to sign executive orders?
shortDescription: Video footage and pictures from the Oval Office show President Donald Trump signing off executive orders with a thick, black Sharpie.

title: Congressional leaders on immigration policy
shortDescription: Speaker Mike Johnson and Representative Pete Aguilar spoke on President Donald Trump's immigration policies.

title: On day two, Trump extended his long list of orders. See highlights
shortDescription: Trump continued full steam ahead on Tuesday after a busy Monday of executive orders. See highlights here.

title: Trump fumes at 'nasty' bishop who told him to 'have mercy'
shortDescription: President Trump called a bishop who pleaded with him to "have mercy" on migrants and the LGBTQ+ community "nasty" and "not very good at her job."

title: Trump admin to investigate local officials who hinder to immigration crackdown
shortDescription: The Justice Department will investigate state and local officials who stand in the way of President Donald Trump's immigration crackdown: memo.

title: Trump nominates former fast-food CEO Andrew Puzder as ambassador to EU
shortDescription: Wednesday will mark President Donald Trump's second full day in office since being sworn in on Monday.

title: Why is Trump sending US military to the border?
shortDescription: Trump signed executive orders aimed at building military presence along the border and designating cartels as foreign terrorist groups, here's what's next.

title: Trump freed Proud Boys and Oath Keepers leaders. Who are they?
shortDescription: The leaders of the Proud Boys and the Oath Keepers were both freed from long sentences by President Donald Trump. Who are they? And what are their groups?

title: Trump pardons founder of illegal drug marketplace serving life in prison
shortDescription: Ulbricht, who used the nom de plume “Dread Pirate Roberts” to hide his identity, was sentenced in 2015 to life in prison.
